comprehensive_overview: Intel oneAPI Math Kernel Library (oneMKL) is a high-performance mathematical function library that provides optimized math routines for scientific, engineering, and machine learning applications. It offers highly optimized, thread-safe, and vectorized functions across various domains such as linear algebra, fast Fourier transforms, statistical analysis, and more.
core_features: Optimized math routines for scientific, engineering, and machine learning applications
Supports linear algebra, fast Fourier transforms, statistical analysis, and more
